price: 23. Akotunamaka(1) na oyo asali te, kasi bango nde bakotunama na maye basalaki.
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ
footnotes: 1 Akotunamaka: Elingi koloba: Allah atunamaka te na maye asalaka.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
